pkgmetadata.longdescription: Module Graphical Lasso // An aggressive dimensionality reduction and network estimation technique for a high-dimensional Gaussian graphical model (GGM). Please refer to: Efficient Dimensionality Reduction for High-Dimensional Network Estimation, Safiye Celik, Benjamin A. Logsdon, Su-In Lee, Proceedings of The 31st International Conference on Machine Learning, 2014, p. 1953--1961.
